title: faker
body: ok I am arguing with a friend about what is faker mainly known for and I am saying faker is mainly known for his zed performance against ryu , he says he is mostly known for his Lb games , but I beg to differ because ive spoken to people who don't watch esports and they know faker for being a zed god

replies.body:
probably both right. Faker is a god LB player
https://youtu.be/m4i4Mvb5oOI


But he also has the most famous Zed play ever (the casting is great too)

https://youtu.be/ZPCfoCVCx3U

He said HSGG was a better LB player than him.

#thingshotshotggdoes
he's known for being the best mid laner on the planet.
his best known play is the zed play. BUT hes are far better lb than zed, sorry dude your mates right. fakers the best lb on the planet
He's know for Riven mid... everyone knows that ;D
